TopicTitle: Is The KerbalSP Twitch channel dying?

Articles.Content:
I noticed there streams are averaging farther distances apart than before

0.17ish: We had a video every monday and friday every week

now: we have a video once every week at the least

so my question is is the twitch channel dying?
Check out twitch.tv/KSPTV as they should be hosting community videos there now, but official stuff is on a serious hold-off. Hope this helps!
I'd rather they focus on the Next update instead of making sure they give us more than two videos of Development a week.

We lost the main guy that did them. Still not sure why he left. I miss him. Anthony (Damion Rayne) I think was one of the best community managers I've ever seen a game have. My guess is there was a lot of non public ridicule during the website blow up that wiped all our posts back several months and had the site down for a long time. But I never saw any public vitriol and in fact saw a lot of gratitude for his hard work getting everything back up.
